website_summaries.verdict: This lock is a good fit for most car tires, golf carts, and ATVs. It will not, however, fit most trucks.
pros: Clamp made out of ABS with PVC coating
PVC coating will not scratch or damage the tire or rim
cons: This chock lock does not fit most trucks, despite company claims

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item hoping it would allow another level of security for my motorcycle. I used it once and it locked with no problem on the wheel. The second time I attempted to use it once in a locking position the key wouldn’t release. I struggled attempting to remove the key but it wouldn’t budge. Now the cheap lock has popped out of the housing while I was pulling on the key in an attempt to remove it. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Yet another "Bait & Switch" scheme... NOT the product shown!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a different wheel clamp than the one shown in the listing photos. It was obviously used, with bent parts, scraped paint, different type keys than shown that didn't work well with the lock, and damaged clamshell packaging. The lock mechanism wasn't the same as shown and was a loose fit inside its housing. The whole thing was very dirty, hands had to be washed just from inspecting it indoors, sending it back. Renting a trailer soon and want it to be secure when on location, this one is too big of a question mark to be trusted.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Tech

customer_reviews.title: Works with larger Tires and wheel wells
customer_reviews.text: This works great, even though my tires are larger and they don't fit into any of the rim slots. At first I was disappointed, but when I put the first one on and removed the wheel chock on the other Tire, this tire clamp gripped my tire and completely stopped the trailer from rolling down the slight Hill. It is a very sturdy anti-theft mechanism that I'm going to purchase for my camper trailer now that I see how well it works for my regular trailer. I highly recommend for everyone and it works for the larger tires as well
customer_reviews.author: White Tail Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought it mainly for my trailer that sits in my driveway. I live in a really safe neighborhood but you never know who it's going to drive by.I bought this one and then about another one from another brand. mainly wanted to see the difference but they're both the same. But it's very easy to install and easy to use.I probably have about eight or nine different types of locking mechanisms on the trailer. But overall I'm very pleased I haven't had any issues with the key freezing up hopefully I don't. Overall I would recommend it It's a good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: B.m

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed, but appears to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because one of the Q&A responses said I could use it on a mobility scooter. (Another responder had said probably not, so I decided to see for myself.) I returned it because it was too large and too heavy for what I needed, but I thought it would be perfect for a boat trailer, camper, or other towed vehicle that is not in use all the time to provide some extra security while it is parked. A friend of mine had a small tow trailer stolen a few years back, and this might have prevented that.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not a standard Size. Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Size too small. Based on the description this was standard size tire clamp, as it turned out it was so small it would not fit my basic truck. Can't return it because the shipping cost as much as the item. Waste of money. Should have gone with the more expensive brand even if it costed twice the money, at least it would be a useful tool.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: NEED TO PURCHASE WHEEL LOCKS WITH THIS FOR ADDED SECURITY!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my 7x14 enclosed trailer to add some security. Shipping was very fast and packaging was good. You will need to purchase Trailer Wheel Locks to make this effective, other wise any one can take off your wheel along with your new tire clamp. I purchase a set of 4 Trailer Wheel Locks and a spare tire lock as well, I also added a Siren Alarm Lock for the Coupler Lock.
customer_reviews.author: Scrat

customer_reviews.title: I feel much more comfortable parking my trailer now that I have this
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor's trailer was stolen from his driveway, and considering I had mine parked right next door, I immediately made this purchase after hearing about it. I feel much more comfortable parking my trailer now that I have this. It's pretty heavy duty and it's fairly easy to take on and off. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5, is that sometimes you have to slide it around to get the right position for it to lock. Overall, I'm really happy I made this small investment and really appreciate having the extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Does not prevent theft.
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather is mildly hard of hearing but is still able to drive. EARLY one morning, he took our trailer to a campsite. The tire clamp destroyed our wheel guard and was gone by the time he got to the destination. He didn’t hear anything so it must’ve come off fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: For super thin wheels only
customer_reviews.text: Only fits this skinniest of wheels. A normal uhaul tire is too wide for it. At its wider settings it is super flimsy too, it needs to be on something extremely thin to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned it, cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Barely fit my wide tire. Working it into place the rubber tips failed and scratched my new rim. Returned to get Wheel Club XL. I don't mind paying more for a better fit and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Eazy to use and works as advertised. This is the second one for me and would order again if needed. I got mine for golf cart security. Will work with many different size tires and wheels.
customer_reviews.author: George R

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it will fit before you order it.
customer_reviews.text: It was worth what I paid for it which was approximately $37. Beware! The product description said it fits most trucks. It did not fit my Toyota Tacoma extended cab 4x4 truck. Make sure it will fit before you order it.
customer_reviews.author: dorje51

customer_reviews.title: Finicky
customer_reviews.text: You have to fuss with it when engaging the lock and sliding portion, but otherwise seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: artisannm

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lets just say a master trailer thief isn't going to be afraid of this. I will say that it attaches easily and gives us a feeling of security from crime of opportunity. Highly visible. As Granddad used to say, "locks are there to keep an honest man honest".
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The wheel lock does what it is designed to do lock the vehicle. It is not heavy so it you have an expensive vehicle you may try another.
customer_reviews.author: Opal Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't impress me, It's not bad for the price. I will be getting a better lock when I find one I like.
customer_reviews.author: Just your average guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product & speedy delivery. I love the fact 3 keys are given.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Added piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for all our extra vehicles - log splitter , dump trailer, Polaris- added security and easy to install and use
customer_reviews.author: Christy C

customer_reviews.title: Too small for tires
customer_reviews.text: Way to small to fit on any of my tires. Maybe if I had a 63 beetle it would have worked. The misleading picture on a trailer wheel was not accurate at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and seems sturdy enough. Like any theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: This is an update - be careful opening the Amazon box, as the keys may be somewhere floating around the box. But..the product does exactly what it's supposed to, and seems sturdy enough. Like any theft deterrent, tho, anyone who really wants whatever it is you're protecting can probably figure this out. For my purposes, tho, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: gogolosuperhero

customer_reviews.title: Security for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 2019 EZ Go TXT2 golf cart with optional 10" wheels like a glove. Easy on-off, arm visible to remind removal before driving. Barrel lock system. Peace of mind knowing it is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: We use these daily.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, use these on our camper for added peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great theft block
customer_reviews.text: Loved this as a deterrent to theft. Easy to use, but will slow theif down.
customer_reviews.author: ymmacyzuam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Trailer Wheel Lock
customer_reviews.text: This trailer wheel lock is super easy to use! We bought a disk/lug nut cover-style the first time and it was a brut. Replaced it with this one and are very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: You must have this if you don’t want you trailer stolen
customer_reviews.text: I seen this item at the trailer shop and this item is what they use for their units. So I purchased me one and looking to get another one for my motorcycle
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought it more for the appearance of security than actual security. It seems like it’s well made and would definitely draw attention if someone were trying to remove it without a key
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should, as others have mentioned there ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should, as others have mentioned there are tools to bypass this, but they are loud and would take just long enough for you to catch a would be robber if you are home
customer_reviews.author: daniel r.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and easy to use. Use it to keep our teardrop camper safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is seriously a padlock of rhinoceros!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my quad over a week ago, and it hasn't been stolen. You draw your own conclusions from that! Honestly, I think this thing barely fits on my quad, but something like a gold cart, or smaller wheels would be totally fine.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Great security
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lock fits great easy to use wheel doesn't move when the lock is on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I ordered 1 and after I saw the quality of this I ordered another one. I bought this to use on my quad and it fits the tires fine. The second one will be used on the quad trailer in the hotel parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jereme S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product bought one then another
customer_reviews.text: Great product bought one then another, convent detourant for thief works great and fast and easy. Thanks for great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie C

customer_reviews.title: Zone Tech Tire Clamp - Premium
customer_reviews.text: I've barely had a chance to install this Tire Clamp. Just now installed it and it fits as advertised. Only time will tell if it deters a thief from helping himself to my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Love it - it works great
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this to secure my riding lawn mower! Love it - it works great.
customer_reviews.author: otto

customer_reviews.title: Works VERY good. Had it on my 3
customer_reviews.text: Works VERY good. Had it on my 3.4 ton van and forgot and it bent a bit but that van would not move. Bought another and will probably buy some more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Valuable theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great theft deterrent. Easy to use. Quick on/off. Multiple key sets.
customer_reviews.author: h-fakter

customer_reviews.title: Great visible deterrent against theft
customer_reviews.text: Great visible deterrent against thieves when combined with other motorcycle security locks. Would make a lot of metal clanking noise if thief is attempting to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Janusse L

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and easy to use device. Clamps on the tire and locks in place with ease. Seems like it should work great additionally secure my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Great safety device!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad's quad that he had in the yard and let me tell you, it is awesome! Fit the tire no problem, easy to use, and works like a charm. It came with two keys which is also really great. Really great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome I have a Suzuki GZ 250 and it fits nice. And it's way now secure than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Ojo Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on my Harley Street Glide to secure it at night when traveling. Easy to use and there is no way for a thief to get this off without making a ton of noise right outside your hotel room that would lead to trouble for him. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Product description is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Too small to fit over most trailer tires. Works fine on single axle car size tires though. Not nearly as heavy duty as they make it sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it doesn't seem like much to grind through this lock
customer_reviews.text: It isn't very solid, and it doesn't seem like much to grind through this lock. But then again, the price of this clamp is much cheaper than the alternatives. I'll be using this with a layered security approach - coupler lock and wheel lock attached to the springs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There’s No Breaking It!
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done, there’s no breaking it! Great device for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nick T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice security option
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and was delivered promptly. Feel like my trailer is more secure with this wheel lock and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amelia d. becke

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works good on my 13” trailer tire. Seems well made
customer_reviews.author: Leland Plume

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Cover for lock came off after first week. Otherwise does what it is suppose to do!
customer_reviews.author: RMC Sports

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I use on my trailer. Seems to work and is easily visible.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond V. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Low cost deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Low cost deterrent to stop someone from playing with your trailer by trying to move it. Could probably withstand some force. However, like any lock they really are for appearances as someone can grind it off in a few seconds with a cordless tool. Nonetheless I do like having it on my trailer as makes me feel a bit more comfortable about leaving it out. Do wish it could go one size smaller in width. Will fit lots of sizes of tires which is a plus and comes with built-in lock.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Warner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality as well
customer_reviews.text: I reccomened this if anyone has had there car stolen. Good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pbtj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small travel trailer. I wanted the extra security (we have a nice hitch lock too).
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my ATV nice and secure, it is really built tough.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable fit for any size tire, if you want ...
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable fit for any size tire, if you want to add a bit of extra security to your mortor vehicle than this is the right buy for you. Fit perfectly for my quad and works just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: krystian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, this product might work well with a passenger vehicle but it just doesn't fit my Tacoma 2001 standard wheels size - 225/75 Radial 15. Be ware!

customer_reviews.title: Product is easy to use and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wheel lock for our new Massey Ferguson tractor. Very happy with it. Easy to put on and take off.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Very fast shipping. Very well built

customer_reviews.title: Great design, it fit my trailer wheel without a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great design, it fit my trailer wheel without a problem. The key design should make it very difficult to tamper with and the cap to cover the key hole is a great idea.

customer_reviews.title: another tool to secure my trailer, I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: another tool to secure my trailer, I use it in addition to tongue lock.

customer_reviews.title: Locks Not
customer_reviews.text: Save your money.......on third time being used the lock would no longer lock!

customer_reviews.title: Three keys
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, it came with three keys which was nice. It is well made as far as I can tell

customer_reviews.title: This works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm. Fit perfectly on my golf cart. Sellers are A+++. If i need another one, i will buy from here.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! I feel much better knowing my boat is better secured.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it claims to do. Would be another if I needed it

customer_reviews.title: I love this wheel lock I've never seen one like it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this wheel lock I've never seen one like it before it works great on any trailer that I have

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought but i was happier with the size. Let's me know my motorcycle is safe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My trailer is now secure and I no longer worry about someone cutting chains and driving off with it.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and durable
customer_reviews.text: Having this wheel lock installed gives me a piece of mind. Highly visible and a convenient theft deterrent. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to use Fits pretty much any sized tire My buddy bought one too and the keys do not work for each others clamp so that is good as well

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this clamp! It does exactly what I need it too!

customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. One of the sides slides out for easy installing to your tire. Fast shipping. Would recommend to friend.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Great item and price. Definitely recommend this product to purchase.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works as advertised. I use it for my golf cart.

customer_reviews.text: Portable and hold the tire well but locks still get stuck with weather.

customer_reviews.text: The tire clamp did not fit the tires it was intended for, it was not wide or deep enought, so beware before purchasing!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: and is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product came fast , and is very easy to use.

customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to put on my new trailer. It didn't come with keys at all!!! Weak!

customer_reviews.text: Got the product and the key would not engage the lock so it was basically useless. I sent it back.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job I guess. Cheaply made. Keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job I guess. Cheaply made. Keeps honest people honest. 18 volt grinder could remove in 10 seconds. Fits my 225/70/15 toy hauler tires

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for security of my. Trailer. It was delivered quickly that I wasn't expected. I can recommend this item to a friend.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was plesently suprized to see how well made it was and how promptly it arrived.

customer_reviews.title: Description is misleading. It said it will fit wheels ...
customer_reviews.text: Description is misleading. It said it will fit wheels 175 - 255 mm. The wheel of my 2006 Toyota Tacoma truck is 255 mm. Even the Amazon pop-up said it would fit. Well........ it will fit on my truck's 255 mm rim as long as I don't have a tire on it!!! It doesn't even come close to fitting. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Mookie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't go slim enough to really hug the wheel. ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't go slim enough to really hug the wheel. Looking at the design if I lost the key I don't think it would be hard to remove. I would say it is more to deter then really lock a wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says, not too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing too special about this, it works just fine on my teardrop camper and I feel it is secure. Took me a few minutes to figure out how to relock it once I set it. I do like that it's big and seems sturdy without weighing a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: ... bit lighter weight than expected and was scraped and dirty. But for the price was acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Product was a bit lighter weight than expected and was scraped and dirty. But for the price was acceptable. Fast deli'wry with prime
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job ok but hard to lock/unlock and fills with rusty water when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.

customer_reviews.title: and it looks like someone cut into the top and bottem of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in today, and it looks like someone cut into the top and bottem of the plastic of the package it came in, and there are no keys, which makes this product usless without them. Where ate the keys! It is not comforting when this anti-theft device looks to be broken into and have the keys stolen. I am demanding my money back until I get the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Leinen

customer_reviews.title: My wheel size is between slots and therefore i have ...
customer_reviews.text: My wheel size is between slots and therefore i have to lock it bigger making it loose on my wheel

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy Lock
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The cylinder was really cheesy. I had to lock and unlock several times just to make sure the lock wasn't going to get stuck on. I put it on an MC and no matter how I put it, it could always be rolled away. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Bob The Dude

product_meta.title: Zone Tech Wheel Lock Security Tire Clamp Premium Quality Heavy Duty Anti- Theft Protective Metal Boot Stabilizer Vehicle Wheel Lock
feature_bullets: SECURITY - The Zone Tech tire clamp securely wraps around your wheel and prevents theft attempts, towing, or any messing with vehicle. It works for cars, vans or even trucks.
HIGHLY VISIBLE - The Zone Tech tire clamp is highly visible due to its bright and striking red and yellow colors.

PREMIUM QUALITY - The Zone Tech tire clamp is constructed out of premium quality ABS to offer you the strongest, most durable and long lasting tire clamp. The handle is soft coated so that it is comfortable to carry. Most of all, the clamp has PVC coating so that it does not scratch or damage the wheel rims.
2 KEYS - The Zone Tech tire clamp includes 2 keys for your convenience. If you misplace, loose, or break one, you always have a beak up available.

EASY TO USE - The Zone Tech tire clamp is easy to us and a simple and convenient set up. No installation required. Simply attach to your wheel, pocket the keys and walk away calmly knowing that your vehicle is once again safe.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars285 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
